sqlMap.statement:
SELECT C.CASE_DATE,T.TRANSACTIONKEY,T.TX_DT,A.STCR,C.APP_ORG_ID, T.PARTY_ID,T.PARTY_CHN_NAME, T.ACCT_NUM,T.CURRENCY_CD,T.AMT,T.RECEIVE_PAY_CD,T.USE_DES,T.OPP_NAME,T.OPP_ACCT_NUM, T.TX_NO,C.APP_STATE_CD,C.CASE_KIND, C.DATE_STATUS_CD,A.STATUS_CD ,T.OPP_ORGANNAME,T.OPP_CARD_NO, T.OVERAREA_IND,T.OPP_ACCT_TYPE_CD,T.CASH_TRANS_FLAG,C.APP_DT,F.STAFFKEY FROM
T07_CASE_APPLICATION C,T47_TRANSACTION_UC T LEFT JOIN T47_STAFF F ON F.PARTY_ID = T.PARTY_ID,T07_CASE_TRANSACTION_KY A
T07_CASE_APPLICATION_UH C,v47_TRANSACTION T LEFT JOIN T47_STAFF F ON F.PARTY_ID = T.PARTY_ID,T07_CASE_TRANSACTION_KY_UH A
V07_CASE_APPLICATION C,T47_TRANSACTION T LEFT JOIN T47_STAFF F ON F.PARTY_ID = T.PARTY_ID, V07_CASE_TRANSACTION A
WHERE C.APPLICATION_NUM=A.APPLICATION_NUM AND A.TRANSACTIONKEY=T.TRANSACTIONKEY AND C.CAST_TYPE='2'
C.APP_ORG_ID in $organkey$
C.APP_ORG_ID= #app_org_id#
T.PARTY_ID= #party_id#
T.ACCT_NUM= #acct_num#
A.STCR= #stcrkey#
T.PARTY_CHN_NAME LIKE '%' || #party_chn_name# || '%'
C.CASE_KIND= #case_kind#
T.CURR_CD= #curr_cd#
t.tx_dt >= #app_dt_start#
t.tx_dt <= #app_dt_end#
F.STAFFKEY IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY C.CASE_DATE
ORDER BY T.PARTY_ID
ORDER BY T.PARTY_CHN_NAME
ORDER BY C.APP_ORG_ID
DESC

SELECT COUNT(T.TRANSACTIONKEY)FROM
T07_CASE_APPLICATION C,T47_TRANSACTION_UC T LEFT JOIN T47_STAFF F ON F.PARTY_ID = T.PARTY_ID,T07_CASE_TRANSACTION_KY A
T07_CASE_APPLICATION_UH C,v47_TRANSACTION T LEFT JOIN T47_STAFF F ON F.PARTY_ID = T.PARTY_ID,T07_CASE_TRANSACTION_KY_UH A
V07_CASE_APPLICATION C,T47_TRANSACTION T LEFT JOIN T47_STAFF F ON F.PARTY_ID = T.PARTY_ID, V07_CASE_TRANSACTION A
WHERE C.APPLICATION_NUM=A.APPLICATION_NUM AND A.TRANSACTIONKEY=T.TRANSACTIONKEY AND C.CAST_TYPE='2'
C.APP_ORG_ID in $organkey$
C.APP_ORG_ID= #app_org_id#
T.PARTY_ID= #party_id#
T.ACCT_NUM= #acct_num#
A.STCR= #stcrkey#
T.PARTY_CHN_NAME LIKE '%' || #party_chn_name# || '%'
C.CASE_KIND= #case_kind#
T.CURR_CD= #curr_cd#
t.tx_dt >= #app_dt_start#
t.tx_dt <= #app_dt_end#
F.STAFFKEY IS NOT NULL

SELECT C.CASE_DATE,T.TRANSACTIONKEY,T.TX_DT,A.STCR,C.APP_ORG_ID, T.PARTY_ID,T.PARTY_CHN_NAME, T.ACCT_NUM,T.CURRENCY_CD,T.AMT,T.RECEIVE_PAY_CD,T.USE_DES,T.OPP_NAME,T.OPP_ACCT_NUM, T.TX_NO,C.APP_STATE_CD,C.CASE_KIND, C.DATE_STATUS_CD,A.STATUS_CD ,T.OPP_ORGANNAME,T.OPP_CARD_NO, T.OVERAREA_IND,T.OPP_ACCT_TYPE_CD,T.CASH_TRANS_FLAG , F.STAFFKEY FROM
T07_CASE_APPLICATION C,T47_TRANSACTION_UC T LEFT JOIN T47_STAFF F ON F.PARTY_ID = T.PARTY_ID,T07_CASE_TRANSACTION_DE A
T07_CASE_APPLICATION_UH C,V47_TRANSACTION T LEFT JOIN T47_STAFF F ON F.PARTY_ID = T.PARTY_ID,T07_CASE_TRANSACTION_DE_UH A
T07_CASE_APPLICATION C,T47_TRANSACTION_UC T LEFT JOIN T47_STAFF F ON F.PARTY_ID = T.PARTY_ID,T07_CASE_TRANSACTION_DE A
WHERE C.APPLICATION_NUM=A.APPLICATION_NUM AND A.TRANSACTIONKEY=T.TRANSACTIONKEY AND C.CAST_TYPE='1'
C.APP_ORG_ID in $organkey$
C.APP_ORG_ID= #app_org_id#
T.PARTY_ID= #party_id#
T.ACCT_NUM= #acct_num#
A.STCR= #stcrkey#
T.PARTY_CHN_NAME LIKE '%' || #party_chn_name# || '%'
C.CASE_KIND= #case_kind#
T.CURR_CD= #curr_cd#
T.TX_DT >= #app_dt_start#
T.TX_DT <= #app_dt_end#
F.STAFFKEY IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY C.CASE_DATE
ORDER BY T.PARTY_ID
ORDER BY T.PARTY_CHN_NAME
ORDER BY C.APP_ORG_ID
DESC

SELECT COUNT(T.TRANSACTIONKEY) FROM
T07_CASE_APPLICATION C,T47_TRANSACTION_UC T LEFT JOIN T47_STAFF F ON F.PARTY_ID = T.PARTY_ID,T07_CASE_TRANSACTION_DE A
T07_CASE_APPLICATION_UH C,V47_TRANSACTION T LEFT JOIN T47_STAFF F ON F.PARTY_ID = T.PARTY_ID,T07_CASE_TRANSACTION_DE_UH A
V07_CASE_APPLICATION C,T47_TRANSACTION T LEFT JOIN T47_STAFF F ON F.PARTY_ID = T.PARTY_ID, V07_CASE_TRANSACTION A
WHERE C.APPLICATION_NUM=A.APPLICATION_NUM AND A.TRANSACTIONKEY=T.TRANSACTIONKEY AND C.CAST_TYPE='1'
C.APP_ORG_ID in $organkey$
C.APP_ORG_ID= #app_org_id#
T.PARTY_ID= #party_id#
T.ACCT_NUM= #acct_num#
A.STCR= #stcrkey#
T.PARTY_CHN_NAME LIKE '%' || #party_chn_name# || '%'
C.CASE_KIND= #case_kind#
T.CURR_CD= #curr_cd#
T.TX_DT >= #app_dt_start#
T.TX_DT <= #app_dt_end#
F.STAFFKEY IS NOT NULL

SELECT APPLICATION_NUM,RECHECK_NUM,FLOW_ID,APP_DT,APP_ORG_ID,CASE_NAME,CAST_TYPE,CASE_KIND,CASE_LEVEL,CASE_DATE,PARTY_ID,PARTY_NAME,APP_STATE_CD,DATE_STATUS_CD,LAST_UPD_DT,LAST_UPD_USER,APP_CASE_REASON,CASE_TRAN_MINDATE,CASE_TRAN_MAXDATE,CASE_END_DATE,CURR_CD,PARTY_CLASS_CD,TAKE_ACTION,ACTION_DESCRIP,ALERT_LEVEL,VALIDATE_IND FROM
T07_CASE_APPLICATION T1
T07_CASE_APPLICATION_UH T1
WHERE 1>0
CAST_TYPE = #cast_type#
APP_ORG_ID = #app_org_id#
PARTY_ID = #party_id#
PARTY_NAME like '%' || #party_name# || '%'
CASE_KIND = #kind#
CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
IS_MENU = #is_menu#
APP_STATE_CD = #deal_state#
APP_ORG_ID in $organkey$
CASE_DATE >= #app_dt_start#
CASE_DATE <= #app_dt_end#
ORDER BY CASE_DATE
ORDER BY PARTY_ID
ORDER BY PARTY_NAME
ORDER BY APP_ORG_ID
ORDER BY APP_STATE_CD
DESC
(SELECT APPLICATION_NUM,RECHECK_NUM,FLOW_ID,APP_DT,APP_ORG_ID,CASE_NAME,CAST_TYPE,CASE_KIND,CASE_LEVEL,CASE_DATE,PARTY_ID,PARTY_NAME,APP_STATE_CD,DATE_STATUS_CD,LAST_UPD_DT,LAST_UPD_USER,APP_CASE_REASON,CASE_TRAN_MINDATE,CASE_TRAN_MAXDATE,CASE_END_DATE,CURR_CD,PARTY_CLASS_CD,TAKE_ACTION,ACTION_DESCRIP,ALERT_LEVEL,VALIDATE_IND FROM T07_CASE_APPLICATION WHERE 1>0
CAST_TYPE = #cast_type#
APP_ORG_ID = #app_org_id#
PARTY_ID = #party_id#
PARTY_NAME like '%' || #party_name# || '%'
CASE_KIND = #kind#
CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
APP_ORG_ID in $organkey$
CASE_DATE >= #app_dt_start#
CASE_DATE <= #app_dt_end#
) UNION ALL (SELECT APPLICATION_NUM,RECHECK_NUM,FLOW_ID,APP_DT,APP_ORG_ID,CASE_NAME,CAST_TYPE,CASE_KIND,CASE_LEVEL,CASE_DATE,PARTY_ID,PARTY_NAME,APP_STATE_CD,DATE_STATUS_CD,LAST_UPD_DT,LAST_UPD_USER,APP_CASE_REASON,CASE_TRAN_MINDATE,CASE_TRAN_MAXDATE,CASE_END_DATE,CURR_CD,PARTY_CLASS_CD,TAKE_ACTION,ACTION_DESCRIP,ALERT_LEVEL,VALIDATE_IND FROM T07_CASE_APPLICATION_UH WHERE 1>0
CAST_TYPE = #cast_type#
APP_ORG_ID = #app_org_id#
PARTY_ID = #party_id#
PARTY_NAME like '%' || #party_name# || '%'
CASE_KIND = #kind#
CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
APP_ORG_ID in $organkey$
CASE_DATE >= #app_dt_start#
CASE_DATE <= #app_dt_end#
)
ORDER BY CASE_DATE
ORDER BY PARTY_ID
ORDER BY PARTY_NAME
ORDER BY APP_ORG_ID
ORDER BY CASESEARCHTIME
DESC

SELECT COUNT(APPLICATION_NUM) FROM
T07_CASE_APPLICATION T1
T07_CASE_APPLICATION_UH T1
WHERE 1>0
CAST_TYPE = #cast_type#
APP_ORG_ID = #app_org_id#
PARTY_ID = #party_id#
PARTY_NAME like '%' || #party_name# || '%'
CASE_KIND = #kind#
CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
IS_MENU = #is_menu#
APP_STATE_CD = #deal_state#
APP_ORG_ID in $organkey$
CASE_DATE >= #app_dt_start#
CASE_DATE <= #app_dt_end#
((SELECT APPLICATION_NUM FROM T07_CASE_APPLICATION WHERE CAST_TYPE='2'
APP_ORG_ID = #app_org_id#
PARTY_ID = #party_id#
PARTY_NAME like '%' || #party_name# || '%'
CASE_KIND = #kind#
CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
APP_ORG_ID in $organkey$
CASE_DATE >= #app_dt_start#
CASE_DATE <= #app_dt_end#
) UNION ALL (SELECT APPLICATION_NUM FROM T07_CASE_APPLICATION_UH WHERE 1>0
CAST_TYPE = #cast_type#
APP_ORG_ID = #app_org_id#
PARTY_ID = #party_id#
PARTY_NAME like '%' || #party_name# || '%'
CASE_KIND = #kind#
CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
APP_ORG_ID in $organkey$
CASE_DATE >= #app_dt_start#
CASE_DATE <= #app_dt_end#
))
